|brand = Amazon |model = Echo |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (SK705DI) (1 Gen) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT hub, wireless speaker system |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = ZWJ-0823, PPD-QCA6234 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;DM3725;TI, DM3725CUS100, 45ZC539, 773, CUS G1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 300 / 600 / 800MHz / 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDIN7DP2-4G; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4X2G323PD-8GD8; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 15 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, Audio out (3.5mm), Alexa support |addchip = Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TLV320DAC3203I;;1; ,,, 92dB SNR Low-Power Stereo ADC;Texas Instruments;TLV320ADC3101;;4; ,,, 15W Filter Class D Stereo Amplifier;Texas Instruments;TPA3110D2;;1; ,,, 3A Step-Down Regulator w/ Int. Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS53312;;1; ,,, Integrated Power Management IC;Texas Instruments;TPS65910A1;;1; ,,, Programmable 9-Output LED Driver;Texas Instruments;LP55231;;4; ,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC74A;;1; ,,, Microphone;Knowles Acoustics;SPA2629LR5H-B;S1053, 0090, V6;7; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/06/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 180 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00Y3QOH5G |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCA6234 <!-- QCA6234X-AM2D --> |rad1modif = SIP (on-board) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR6004X; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR3002; |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5

*Loudspeaker, Subwoofer, 60mm Diameter, w/ Integral 2-Wire Harness, &1 Label *Loudspeaker, Full Range, 50mm Diameter, w/ Integral 2-Wire Harness, &1 Label *AC Adapter, 15V, 1.4A, 21W, 6ft Cord, w/ Rubber Band - MFR: LITE-ON TECHNOLOGY CORP - MPN: PA-1210-1AB1 :4-Layer, Flex Kapton, Lead-Free - MFR: ORIENTAL PRINTED CIRCUITS LTD -->
